pkgmetadata.longdescription: Group Lasso Penalized Learning Using a Unified BMD Algorithm // A unified algorithm, blockwise-majorization-descent (BMD), for efficiently computing the solution paths of the group-lasso penalized least squares, logistic regression, Huberized SVM and squared SVM. The package is an implementation of Yang, Y. and Zou, H. (2015) doi:10.1007/s11222-014-9498-5.
